TopicTitle: Perigrine Class Space Carrier a Macey style ship

Articles.Content:
The Perigrine Class Carrier

After spending a huge amount of time and constantly changing things this is what I have created.

If anyone was wondering, yes I based it off of the Spirit of Kerbin (Macey Dean), however the ship bay is 4 meters shorter. It also has higher deltaV and a side opening instead of a front opening.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

I will put in a download link soon as well as a video on how to get it to lko

MechJeb was only used for DeltaV stats

Edit: Video http://youtu.be/a-Z6JQtxlT

Also the craft contains over 4000 delta-V fully fueled

MOD EDIT: html is disabled on these forums, I took the liberty of using bbcode for your album link

Edited January 17, 2015 by JTpopcorn

Because using daylight takes would have shown flaws on the craft?

I really dont get it...
Actually I was just to excited. After spending hours on a ship you forget the little things like a time warp to the light.
